docs.text: Information model for the NBNL-capaciteitskaart. The capacity heatmaps information model was defined to cover a superset of data exchanged by the NL distribution system operators. A minimum set of data is defined that all operators are expected to conform to, along with a number of optional properties and data types. The data is intended to be presented as a hierarchy with a HeatmapDataSet at its root, then Substations and Circuits nested inside the HeatmapDataSet . Substations and Ciruits then have their own child elements forming a tree of data with the HeatmapDataSet at the root. This information model is based in part on the LTDS Capacity Heatmap Information Model , which itself is published under the Open Government License , under ©Crown copyright 2024. docs.text: Class: Circuit A circuit representing a connection between substations. This could be an HV circuit between stations or a circuit feeding multiple secondary stations from a primary. This data element is provided to support utilities that wish to share specfic or all circuits. This may represent the aggregation of all generation at a voltage level or individual connected/contracted/quoted generators. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 is_a : Equipment attributes : generationConnectedCapacity : name : generationConnectedCapacity description : The currently connected generation capacity (in MVA). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : nbnl:Generator.generationConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A required : true generationContractedCapacity : name : generationContractedCapacity description : The currently contracted generation capacity (in MVA) excluding any that are already contracted or connected (i.e. do not include any generation that is included in generationConnectedCapacity). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : nbnl:Generator.generationContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A required : true generationQuotedCapacity : name : generationQuotedCapacity description : The currently active quoted generation capacity (in MVA) above contracted (this is optional as connected/contracted generation may not have records of quotes and after a value is contracted this value is no longer relevant). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : nbnl:Generator.generationQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A voltage : name : voltage description : The voltage the generator (in kV) is connected at. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : nbnl:Generator.voltage domain_of : - Circuit - Demand - Generator - Storage range : KiloV required : true technologyType : name : technologyType description : The technology the connected generation e.g. CHP, Wind, PV, Battery. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Generator.technologyType domain_of : - docs.text: Class: PowerSystemResource A power system resource (PSR) can be an item of equipment such as a switch, an equipment container containing many individual items of equipment such as a substation, or an organisational entity such as sub-control area. Power system resources can have measurements associated. It may be non unique and may not correlate to a naming hierarchy. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.description alias : description owner : PowerSystemResource domain_of : - HeatmapDataSet - Constraint - Curtailment - IdentifiedObject - NameType - NameTypeAuthority range : string mRID : name : mRID description : Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. docs.text: Class: Rating A rating assigned to a transformer. This allows multiple ratings to be defined for a single transformer. Different ratings for different voltages (e.g. 20->50 is different from 50->20 for reverse powerflow). URI: nbnl:Rating classDiagram class Rating click Rating href "../Rating" Rating : fromVoltage Rating : name Rating : summerRating Rating : toVoltage Rating : winterRating Slots Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance name 1 String Human readble name of the rating direct summerRating 1 MegaV-A Summer rating (in MVA) direct winterRating 1 MegaV-A Winter rating (in MVA) direct fromVoltage 1 KiloV From voltage (in kV) for the rating direct toVoltage 1 KiloV To voltage (in kV) for the rating direct Usages used by used in type used PowerTransformer Ratings range Rating Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self nbnl:Rating native nbnl:Rating LinkML Source Direct name : Rating description : A rating assigned to a transformer. For a GeoJSON Heatmap format this data will be part of the feature itself allowing for more complex geometry. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Coordinate domain_of : - Substation range : Coordinate required : true demandFirmCapacity : name : demandFirmCapacity description : The firm capacity (in MVA) for demand at the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demandContractedCapacity : name : demandContractedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandConnectedCapacity : name : demandConnectedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandQuotedCapacity : name : demandQuotedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandAvailableCapacity : name : demandAvailableCapacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demandMaximum : name : demandMaximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demandMinimum : name : demandMinimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand99Percentile : name : demand99Percentile description : The 99th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand99Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand75Percentile : name : demand75Percentile description : The 75th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand75Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand50Percentile : name : demand50Percentile description : The 50th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual storage devices. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Storage multivalued : true alias : Storage owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Storage OtherConstraints : name : OtherConstraints description : An additional constraint on the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.OtherConstraints multivalued : true alias : OtherConstraints owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : Constraint Transformers : name : Transformers description : The transformers connected at the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Transformers multivalued : true alias : Transformers owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : PowerTransformer Curtailments : name : Curtailments description : Curtailments at the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Curtailments multivalued : true alias : Curtailments owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Curtailment description : name : description description : The description is a free human readable text describing or naming the object. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended.\r\nFor CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.mRID alias : mRID owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : string Names : name : Names description : All names of this identified object. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.Names multivalued : true alias : Names owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : Name class_uri : cim:Substation

docs.text: name : Substation description : A Substation with connect demand, generation or storage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 is_a : EquipmentContainer attributes : type : name : type description : The type of the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.type domain_of : - Substation - Constraint - Curtailment - Geometry range : SubstationKind required : true area : name : area description : The name of the license area. This should be the abbreviation used in the license (e.g. STEDIN for Stedin) from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.area domain_of : - Substation required : true shortCode : name : shortCode description : Short code name for substation (alphanumeric, uppercase letters only). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.shortCode domain_of : - Substation voltages : name : voltages description : The voltages at the Substation in Kilovolts (kV). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.voltages multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation - PowerTransformer range : integer required : true Coordinate : name : Coordinate description : The longitude/latitude value of the substation as a single latitude/longitude point. For a GeoJSON Heatmap format this data will be part of the feature itself allowing for more complex geometry. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Coordinate domain_of : - Substation range : Coordinate required : true demandFirmCapacity : name : demandFirmCapacity description : The firm capacity (in MVA) for demand at the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demandContractedCapacity : name : demandContractedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandConnectedCapacity : name : demandConnectedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandQuotedCapacity : name : demandQuotedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandAvailableCapacity : name : demandAvailableCapacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demandMaximum : name : demandMaximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demandMinimum : name : demandMinimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand99Percentile : name : demand99Percentile description : The 99th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand99Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand75Percentile : name : demand75Percentile description : The 75th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand75Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand50Percentile : name : demand50Percentile description : The 50th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand50Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand25Percentile : name : demand25Percentile description : The 25th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand25Percentile domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demandConstraint : name : demandConstraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraint domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : RAGKind required : true demandConstraintLimitingFactor : name : demandConstraintLimitingFactor description : The limiting factor for demand constraints, either thermal, voltage or fault level for the demandConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraintLimitingFactor domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true generationFirmCapacity : name : generationFirmCapacity description : The total firm generation capacity (in MVA) of the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. The approach used to calculate this value should be defined in accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationFirmCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generationConnectedCapacity : name : generationConnectedCapacity description : Sum of all generation (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value forgenerationConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationConnectedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConnectedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationContractedCapacity : name : generationContractedCapacity description : Sum of all generation (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any generation that is included in generationConnectedCapacity). This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value for generationContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationContractedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationContractedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationQuotedCapacity : name : generationQuotedCapacity description : Sum of all currently quoted generation (in MVA) at the substation excluding any that are already contracted or connected. This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value for generationQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationQuotedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationQuotedCapacity domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationAvailableCapacity : name : generationAvailableCapacity description : Available generation capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm generation, capacity, demand, connected capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generationConstraint : name : generationConstraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConstraint domain_of : - Substation range : RAGKind generationConstraintLimitingFactor : name : generationConstraintLimitingFactor description : The limiting factor for generation constraints, either thermal or fault level for the generationConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConstraintLimitingFactor domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true breakerRatedCurrent : name : breakerRatedCurrent description : The rated normal current (in kA) of the circuit breaker is the RMS value of the current with which the circuit breaker shall be able to carry continuously. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerRatedCurrent domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerBreakingCapacity : name : breakerBreakingCapacity description : The short-circuit current (in kA) that the breakers are capable of breaking. It is expressed in KA RMS at contact separation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerBreakingCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerMakingCapacity : name : breakerMakingCapacity description : The making current (in kA) of the circuit breaker, when closed on a short circuit, is the peak value of the maximum current wave (including dc component) in the first cycle of the current after the circuit is closed by the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerMakingCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerAvailableCapacity : name : breakerAvailableCapacity description : The available capacity (in kA) of the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerShortCircuitCurrent : name : breakerShortCircuitCurrent description : The short circuit current (in kA) of a circuit breaker is the RMS value of current that a breaker can carry in a fully closed condition without damage, for the specified time interval under prescribed condition. These ratings are based on thermal limitation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitCurrent domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerShortCircuitDuration : name : breakerShortCircuitDuration description : Specified time interval (in seconds) the Short Circuit Current can be carried for without damage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitDuration domain_of : - Substation range : integer reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity : name : reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity description : The reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. 0 if there are no reverse powerflow capabilities. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity : name : reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity description : The available reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true embeddedCapacityRegister : name : embeddedCapacityRegister description : TODO A URL to the embedded capacity register entry for this station. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.embeddedCapacityRegister domain_of : - Substation Demands : name : Demands description : The demands at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual demands. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Demands multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation range : Demand Generators : name : Generators description : The generators at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual generators. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Generators multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation range : Generator Storage : name : Storage description : The storage devices at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual storage devices. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Storage multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation range : Storage OtherConstraints : name : OtherConstraints description : An additional constraint on the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.OtherConstraints multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : Constraint Transformers : name : Transformers description : The transformers connected at the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Transformers multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation range : PowerTransformer Curtailments : name : Curtailments description : Curtailments at the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Curtailments multivalued : true domain_of : - Substation range : Curtailment class_uri : cim:Substation

docs.text: name : Substation description : A Substation with connect demand, generation or storage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 is_a : EquipmentContainer attributes : type : name : type description : The type of the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.type alias : type owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Constraint - Curtailment - Geometry range : SubstationKind required : true area : name : area description : The name of the license area. This should be the abbreviation used in the license (e.g. STEDIN for Stedin) from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.area alias : area owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string required : true shortCode : name : shortCode description : Short code name for substation (alphanumeric, uppercase letters only). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.shortCode alias : shortCode owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string voltages : name : voltages description : The voltages at the Substation in Kilovolts (kV). from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.voltages multivalued : true alias : voltages owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - PowerTransformer range : integer required : true Coordinate : name : Coordinate description : The longitude/latitude value of the substation as a single latitude/longitude point. For a GeoJSON Heatmap format this data will be part of the feature itself allowing for more complex geometry. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Coordinate alias : Coordinate owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Coordinate required : true demandFirmCapacity : name : demandFirmCapacity description : The firm capacity (in MVA) for demand at the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandFirmCapacity alias : demandFirmCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true demandContractedCapacity : name : demandContractedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any demand that is included in demandConnectedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandContractedCapacity values in the Demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandContractedCapacity alias : demandContractedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandConnectedCapacity : name : demandConnectedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandConnectedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConnectedCapacity alias : demandConnectedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandQuotedCapacity : name : demandQuotedCapacity description : Sum of all demand (in MVA) currently quoted at the substation excluding contracted and connected (i.e. does not include demandConnectedCapacity or demandContractedCapacity). This includes individual demands and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect demands and storage. The value for demandQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the demandQuotedCapacity values in the demand and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandQuotedCapacity alias : demandQuotedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit - Demand - Storage range : MegaV-A demandAvailableCapacity : name : demandAvailableCapacity description : The available demand capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm capacity, maximum demand, connected capacity, quoted capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. The value should reflect the capacity a network operator would make available to a connecting party, which may be calculated for the most onerous season, or a value based on more detailed analysis and internal policies. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandAvailableCapacity alias : demandAvailableCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A required : true demandMaximum : name : demandMaximum description : The maximum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand without removing the impact of any generation on observed demand at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMaximum alias : demandMaximum owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demandMinimum : name : demandMinimum description : The minimum demand (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 33kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 33kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. Users wishing to see separate summer/winter peaks can obtain this from the data. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandMinimum alias : demandMinimum owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand99Percentile : name : demand99Percentile description : The 99th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand99Percentile alias : demand99Percentile owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand75Percentile : name : demand75Percentile description : The 75th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand75Percentile alias : demand75Percentile owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand50Percentile : name : demand50Percentile description : The 50th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand50Percentile alias : demand50Percentile owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demand25Percentile : name : demand25Percentile description : The 25th percentile of demanding (in MVA) at the substation. This is a normalised value calculated using historic measured values during normal operating conditions. The data represents net demand corrected for any generation at the substation, demand diversity factors, and any other internal processing normally undertaken. All substations at 50kV and above must include demand data; for substations below 50kV, if corrected, net demand data is not available, the value should be omitted. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demand25Percentile alias : demand25Percentile owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : MegaV-A demandConstraint : name : demandConstraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraint alias : demandConstraint owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : RAGKind required : true demandConstraintLimitingFactor : name : demandConstraintLimitingFactor description : The limiting factor for demand constraints, either thermal, voltage or fault level for the demandConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.demandConstraintLimitingFactor alias : demandConstraintLimitingFactor owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true generationFirmCapacity : name : generationFirmCapacity description : The total firm generation capacity (in MVA) of the substation. Any constraints that impact this capacity should be listed as individual constraints linked to the substation. The approach used to calculate this value should be defined in accompanying documentation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationFirmCapacity alias : generationFirmCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generationConnectedCapacity : name : generationConnectedCapacity description : Sum of all generation (in MVA) currently connected at the substation. This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value forgenerationConnectedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationConnectedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConnectedCapacity alias : generationConnectedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationContractedCapacity : name : generationContractedCapacity description : Sum of all generation (in MVA) currently contracted at the substation which is not yet connected (i.e. do not include any generation that is included in generationConnectedCapacity). This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value for generationContractedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationContractedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationContractedCapacity alias : generationContractedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationQuotedCapacity : name : generationQuotedCapacity description : Sum of all currently quoted generation (in MVA) at the substation excluding any that are already contracted or connected. This includes individual generation and storage that are explicitly defined and aggregate value of other connect generation and storage. The value for generationQuotedCapacity must be greater than or equal to the sum of the generationQuotedCapacity values in the Generator and Storage elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationQuotedCapacity alias : generationQuotedCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Generator - Storage range : MegaV-A generationAvailableCapacity : name : generationAvailableCapacity description : Available generation capacity (in MVA) at the substation. This value is calculated based on total firm generation, capacity, demand, connected capacity, contracted capacity, and any other constraints on the network. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationAvailableCapacity alias : generationAvailableCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true generationConstraint : name : generationConstraint description : A RAG definition of the demand constraints at the substation. A utility should provide details on how this RAG status is calculated as part of the accompanying documentation from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConstraint alias : generationConstraint owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : RAGKind generationConstraintLimitingFactor : name : generationConstraintLimitingFactor description : The limiting factor for generation constraints, either thermal or fault level for the generationConstraint value. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.generationConstraintLimitingFactor alias : generationConstraintLimitingFactor owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : LimitingFactorKind required : true breakerRatedCurrent : name : breakerRatedCurrent description : The rated normal current (in kA) of the circuit breaker is the RMS value of the current with which the circuit breaker shall be able to carry continuously. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerRatedCurrent alias : breakerRatedCurrent owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerBreakingCapacity : name : breakerBreakingCapacity description : The short-circuit current (in kA) that the breakers are capable of breaking. It is expressed in KA RMS at contact separation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerBreakingCapacity alias : breakerBreakingCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerMakingCapacity : name : breakerMakingCapacity description : The making current (in kA) of the circuit breaker, when closed on a short circuit, is the peak value of the maximum current wave (including dc component) in the first cycle of the current after the circuit is closed by the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerMakingCapacity alias : breakerMakingCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerAvailableCapacity : name : breakerAvailableCapacity description : The available capacity (in kA) of the circuit breaker. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerAvailableCapacity alias : breakerAvailableCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerShortCircuitCurrent : name : breakerShortCircuitCurrent description : The short circuit current (in kA) of a circuit breaker is the RMS value of current that a breaker can carry in a fully closed condition without damage, for the specified time interval under prescribed condition. These ratings are based on thermal limitation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitCurrent alias : breakerShortCircuitCurrent owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : KiloA breakerShortCircuitDuration : name : breakerShortCircuitDuration description : Specified time interval (in seconds) the Short Circuit Current can be carried for without damage. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.breakerShortCircuitDuration alias : breakerShortCircuitDuration owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : integer reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity : name : reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity description : The reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. 0 if there are no reverse powerflow capabilities. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity alias : reversePowerFlowTotalCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity : name : reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity description : The available reverse capacity (in MVA) for the substation from lower to higher voltage levels. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity alias : reversePowerFlowAvailableCapacity owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : MegaV-A required : true embeddedCapacityRegister : name : embeddedCapacityRegister description : TODO A URL to the embedded capacity register entry for this station. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.embeddedCapacityRegister alias : embeddedCapacityRegister owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : string Demands : name : Demands description : The demands at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual demands. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Demands multivalued : true alias : Demands owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Demand Generators : name : Generators description : The generators at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual generators. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Generators multivalued : true alias : Generators owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Generator Storage : name : Storage description : The storage devices at the station covering connected, contracted and quoted. This data is optional and may aggregated into the substation attributes, but utilities may optionally provide details on individual storage devices. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Storage multivalued : true alias : Storage owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Storage OtherConstraints : name : OtherConstraints description : An additional constraint on the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.OtherConstraints multivalued : true alias : OtherConstraints owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation - Circuit range : Constraint Transformers : name : Transformers description : The transformers connected at the substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Transformers multivalued : true alias : Transformers owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : PowerTransformer Curtailments : name : Curtailments description : Curtailments at the Substation. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : nbnl:Substation.Curtailments multivalued : true alias : Curtailments owner : Substation domain_of : - Substation range : Curtailment description : name : description description : The description is a free human readable text describing or naming the object. It may be non unique and may not correlate to a naming hierarchy. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.description alias : description owner : Substation domain_of : - HeatmapDataSet - Constraint - Curtailment - IdentifiedObject - NameType - NameTypeAuthority range : string mRID : name : mRID description : Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended.\r\nFor CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.mRID alias : mRID owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : string Names : name : Names description : All names of this identified object. from_schema : https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart rank : 1000 slot_uri : cim:IdentifiedObject.Names multivalued : true alias : Names owner : Substation domain_of : - IdentifiedObject range : Name class_uri : cim:Substation

docs.text: im-capaciteitskaart The capacity heatmaps information model was defined to cover a superset of data exchanged by the NL distribution system operators. A minimum set of data is defined that all operators are expected to conform to, along with a number of optional properties and data types. The data is intended to be presented as a hierarchy with a HeatmapDataSet at its root, then Substations and Circuits nested inside the HeatmapDataSet . Substations and Ciruits then have their own child elements forming a tree of data with the HeatmapDataSet at the root. This information model is based in part on the LTDS Capacity Heatmap Information Model , which itself is published under the Open Government License , under ©Crown copyright 2024. URI: https://begrippen.netbeheernederland.nl/im-capaciteitskaart
docs.title: im-capaciteitskaart

docs.text: Slot: mRID Master resource identifier issued by a model authority. The mRID is unique within an exchange context. Global uniqueness is easily achieved by using a UUID, as specified in RFC 4122, for the mRID. The use of UUID is strongly recommended.\r\nFor CIMXML data files in RDF syntax conforming to IEC 61970-552, the mRID is mapped to rdf:ID or rdf:about attributes that identify CIM object elements. docs.text: Slot: toSubstation mRID of the Substations the Circuit is to (optional if LV circuits are shown but no LV/Secondary substations). Where CIM data is being produced the identifiers attributes reflect the mRID of the Substations. Where no CIM mRID is yet being produced, the names of the Substations should be used.
